11.content: How much should Cosmo grow?
11.title: Cosmo

111.content: Okay, I feel that this is a question that should really be asked in my opinion, but should the story be canon to the Sonic X universe, or should it be non-canon so it has nothing to do with the respective series?
111.title: Canon or Non-Canon

1111.content: It should be canon to the Sonic X universe and it should have Cosmo be already brought back to life. That way, things don't get too complicated.
1111.title: Canon

11111.content: Are you sure you want Cosmo to be 50 ft or do you want her to be bigger?
11111.title: Continue

111113.content:
Well, we all know that Cosmo isn't a male member of her race, so they don't turn into those colossal beings that would be a perfect fit in a Godzilla movie, where they would destroy whatever threatens them and what not. Well what if the female version of their race can do something similar to that, but instead it just makes them gigantic and not as hedious. Well Cosmo, who survived the whole ordeal somehow was flying over Sonic's homeworld, and she was now looking over the entire universe, making sure that all of the planet's life is fully restored accordingly across the universe.

Well to fully explain how she survived, well that is something that isn't currently known at this point. Some said that her sacrifice turned her somehow into a goddess like being, or maybe the explosion that occurred somehow revealed an unknown being in the world. Well we don't know what that reason was, but all we know is that Cosmo is going to see Tails once more.

Knowing where Tails once lived, she fly right to the island herself in her transformed state, but that transformed state also did came with one other major thing that occurred to her. She is now 200ft, and some of the worlds that she revisited, well let's just say that there was some complications that had to be sorted out with all the panicking alien races and what not. Many see her as a freak, and well... you get he point.
111113.title: Cosmo can do that?

1111131.content: Cosmo arrives on Sonic's planet at 200 ft tall. "HEY, WHERE IS EVERYBODY?" Her voice thundered all across the land. Tails ran outside and gasped. "Cosmo! You're okay!" "YES, TAILS. I JUST TRANSFORMED INTO A GIANT FORM, THAT'S ALL. WHAT DO YOU WANT TO DO NOW?" "Well, since you're such a giant and I'm like an ant to you, I could...
1111131.title: 200 ft Cosmo arrives

choices: Cosmo has control and takes him out of her mouth
Cosmo loses control of her actions and swallows him
11111311.content:
Tails asks, "Hey, Cosmo. Since you're so giant and I'm like a dot to you, would it be okay if I rode around in your mouth for a little bit?"
Cosmo exclaimed, "NO WAY, TAILS! MY TEETH COULD CHEW YOU UP OR WORSE! WHAT IF I ACCIDENTALLY SWALLOW YOU? YOU'D BE IN MY STOMACH AND IF YOU DIDN'T GET OUT, YOU'D BE DIGESTED BY MY STOMACH ACIDS!" Tails replied, "Don't worry. I promise I'll be careful. I'm just curious what it would be like, that's all." With a worried look, Cosmo said, "ALL RIGHT, TAILS. I TRUST YOU. JUST BE VERY CAREFUL. I DON'T WANT TO EAT YOU." Cosmo picked up Tails and opened her mouth, revealing her giant tongue and colossal, white teeth. She dropped Tails inside and closed her mouth, sloshing him around."I KNOW WE'VE KISSED BEFORE, BUT I NEVER REALIZED HOW YOU TASTED. Tails replied, "Yeah, you're right." "ARE YOU OKAY IN THERE?" "Yeah, it's just hot and wet in here."

Cosmo answered, "YEAH, IT SHOULD BE MOIST BECAUSE OF THE SALIVA. YOU DO TASTE PRETTY GOOD, TAILS." Tails laughs and says, "Thanks, I guess." Suddenly, a weird feeling comes over Cosmo. One part of her tells her, "HE'S SO TINY AND DELICIOUS. SWALLOW HIM AND YOU CAN BE TOGETHER FOREVER WITH HIM IN YOUR STOMACH." The other side tells her, "BUT HE'S MY BOYFRIEND AND I LOVE HIM. I WOULD NEVER DO THAT!" Which side wins this conflict?
11111311.title: Inside Cosmo's mouth

choices: Tails starts research into Cosmo's growth
111113111.content:
In the very end though, Cosmo's mind thinks right and she decides to open her mouth and take Tails right out with her mouth and back into her hand. "Sorry about that Tails, I just realized and I think you should to that my mouth is a pretty bad idea, because of what I just said." Cosmo then told him about why it would be a very bad idea. Tails then ended up blushing. "Well, your right, thinking about it now I wouldn't want to end up in your stomach. I wasn't just curious how you gotten so tall or something, and how you still alive." Tails wondered.

"Well it's a bit of a long story, but let's just say from all I know, my work across the universe wasn't done just yet. Still watching all the planets heal to its original state and what not. So I figure I come by and check on your world to make sure it was healing." Cosmo then replied back to Tails, who understands. The planet had to be healing after the entire battle with the Dark Oak, and now with the planets now healing, it was great to visit them once more. "But now I grew is something I wonder."

"Well that could try to find out." Tails replied.

What happens now?
111113111.title: Cosmo has control and takes him out of her mouth

choices: Cosmo wants to kiss Tails at her gigantic size
Cosmo wants to play a pretend rampage game
1111131111.content:
Tails wondered, "It's very curious how you became 200 feet tall all of a sudden." Cosmo replied, "YES, I KNOW. I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT'S GOING ON! YOU'RE LIKE A SPECK TO ME!" Tails did some research on the members of her species and came to a conclusion. "I think I've figured it out!" "WHAT IS IT?" Tails said, "Well, the male members of your species have the power to grow themselves to a gigantic size and become hideous monsters. According to these DNA readings, the females of your species, including you, have the power to just grow huge while still staying attractive. Also, the males became the size of dinosaurs. You are 200 feet, about the size of a skyscraper, so I guess the females can grow larger, too."

Cosmo replied, "OH, OKAY. UNTIL WE FIND OUT THE TRUE CAUSE OF THIS, CAN WE HAVE SOME FUN TOGETHER?" Tails laughed and replied, "Of course, Cosmo! What did you have in mind?" "WELL..."
1111131111.title: Tails starts research into Cosmo's growth

choices: The kiss went off without issue
11111311111.content:
"Well I was thinking maybe that you and I could finally do something that we both wanted to do for a very long time, well me more but you get what I am trying to do." She said to him just as she started to think in her head about kissing Tails as she surely has tons of feelings for her. However at the same time, if she kisses Tails wrong, she would end up sucking him right into her mouth and maybe right down her stomach and that would cause Tails to die a horrible death as he would be burned by her stomach acids. "Kiss you." She said to him just as she finally revealed it.

Just hearing those words Tails begin to blush immensely as this was totally the most unexpected request that Tails has ever heard in his life. Tails might end up eaten, or something and when he heard some growling in Cosmo's stomach, his fears were confirmed. "Uh... you must be hungry,"

"Oh yeah, I am, but will you do it?" Cosmo asked kindly as she really wants to kiss Tails.

"Anything for you." Tails smiled.

Cosmo brings him up to her face and then Tails begins licking his lips just as she comes towards Tails, and then suddenly....
11111311111.title: Cosmo wants to kiss Tails at her gigantic size

111113111111.content:
The kiss goes out exactly perfectly as both of the lips came into perfect contact, and it went onto for awhile, and at some point Tails was starting to get pretty worry if Cosmo would end up accidentally sucking Tails right into her mouth and down into her stomach, but it turns out that everything went out just perfect. After a minute or so of kissing, Tails and Cosmo end up ending the kiss, and they both feel something amazing for each other.

"You know, I have to admit, I really did miss having you around here, and it really makes me want to go out on a date later tonight just for this alone." Tails admitted as he really does have a lot of feelings for Cosmo because of all the adventures that's they had truly together while out on space, fighting those alien invaders that wanted to take the planet eggs and rid the life of those planets. It was really scary to see for sure, but at least they pull through and won. Now how Cosmo's came back, is a question in its self.

"You know, I would really love to go on a date with you. If only I was able to get a outfit for myself and you one, but I don't think they make outfits for giants like me." Cosmo giggled as she truly accepted his offer to go on a date with Tails.

"I will see what I can do, but first question, where do you want to go?"
111113111111.title: The kiss went off without issue

choices: Cosmo swallows a sandwich so Tails can have some
Tails tries to fly out before digestion starts
111113111112.content:
As the giant Cosmo lifted Tails to her mouth to kiss him, her stomach growled because she was hungry. Tails asked if she was hungry. Cosmo replied, "YEAH, I AM, BUT I WOULD NEVER TRY TO HURT YOU." Her stomach growled louder and she groaned in pain. She started to lick her lips and Tails got worried. "Cosmo, are you okay?" Cosmo was trying her hardest to resist the urge and she was fighting it as hard as she could. Part of her said, "I'M SO HUNGRY. I COULD SWALLOW HIM AND HE'D BE SAFE IN MY STOMACH." In her head, she replied, "NO, I CAN'T! NO MATTER HOW HUNGRY I AM, I WON'T EAT MY OWN BOYFRIEND! I'LL JUST GO TO THE KITCHEN AND MAKE MYSELF SOMETHING."

Unfortunately, the temptation was too strong and Cosmo said, "I'M SORRY, TAILS, BUT I'M STARVING AND YOU'RE DOT SIZE, SO I JUST HAVE TO EAT SOMETHING." Cosmo raised Tails above her open mouth, showing her tongue and gigantic teeth. Tails got scared and said, "Cosmo, no! This isn't you! You're losing control and you have to fight it!" Cosmo smiled and told him, "DON'T WORRY, TAILS. YOU'LL SURVIVE IN MY STOMACH. I'LL MAKE SURE YOU LAND ON A DRY SPOT WITH NO ACID, OKAY? I PROMISE I WILL LET YOU OUT ONCE I GET CONTROL OF MY ACTIONS AGAIN." Tails replied, "As crazy as you're acting right now, I trust you. Next time, try to eat some food from the kitchen first." Cosmo nodded her head and said, "OF COURSE. I'LL NEVER DO ANYTHING LIKE THIS AGAIN." Tails smiled and said, "I know you won't. I love you and I'll go along with this only because I'm curious what the inside of a Seedrian looks like. I need to see if it's similar to anthropomorphic animals like myself and our other friends, as well as humans. You know, for science's sake."

Cosmo laughed and said, "ALL RIGHT, THEN! I LOVE YOU TOO, TAILS! BE CAREFUL! NOW I HAVE TO TASTE YOU FIRST." Cosmo stuck out her tongue and licked Tails' entire body, causing him to be coated in saliva. Cosmo placed Tails inside her mouth and closed it. Tails illuminated the area with his flashlight. Cosmo swished him around with her tongue. "MMMMM!!! YOU TASTE GOOD, TAILS!" Cosmo swallowed Tails and he landed on a dry spot in her stomach. Cosmo patted her belly and said, "YOU WERE DELICIOUS, TAILS! SIT TIGHT FOR A FEW MINUTES." Cosmo's stomach rumbled and growled with the acids sloshing everywhere. Tails said, "Wow, this is amazing to look at. Perhaps I should get out of here, though." Suddenly, Cosmo thought about what she just did and gasped. "OH NO! WHAT HAVE I DONE? I'M SO SORRY, TAILS! NEXT TIME, I WON'T GIVE INTO TEMPTATION SO EASILY, I PROMISE!" Cosmo started crying uncontrollably. Tails smiled from inside her stomach and said, "Don't worry about it. I forgive you. You weren't thinking straight, so it isn't entirely your fault. I'll get out of here just fine." Cosmo wiped her eyes and said, "OH, THANK YOU,TAILS. I DON'T KNOW WHAT I WAS THINKING. NOW I'VE SWALLOWED YOU AND YOU'RE IN MY STOMACH. BEING SO GIANT IS SCARY. JUST BECAUSE I WAS HUNGRY AND YOU'RE LIKE AN ANT TO ME, I MADE YOU MY SNACK. I'LL BE MORE CAREFUL FROM NOW ON. I'M SUCH A MONSTER!"

Tails shook his head and said, "No, Cosmo. Don't ever say that about yourself. You're my girlfriend and I love you with all my heart. Don't ever forget that." "I WON'T, TAILS. I LOVE YOU, TOO. I HOPE YOU GET OUT SAFELY." Tails replied, "Thanks, I'll try my best." What happens next?
111113111112.title: Cosmo gets hungry

choices: Start picking up citizens for fun
Go on a real fun rampage
Dr. Eggman shows up with a giant robot
11111311112.content:
Cosmo it appeared had the exact prefect idea in mind "HMMMM WELLL SEEING HOW I'M A MASSIVE GIANT TAILS HOW ABOUT ONE QUICK RUN AROUND THE CITY? YA KNOW LIKE A ACTUAL MONSTER?" Tails got the idea though it didn't sound so cool to him but who was he to argue with a nearly 200 foot plant humanoid?
"Er right! Okay Cosmo just a quick one but please don't try to hurt anyone!" Te fox genius pleaded but she just giggled causing a earthquake
"Oops sorry! no problem Tails I'll be extra gentle you'll see now come on time for some fun!" As holding him tightly but in a gentle way she began marching towards the shining metropolis of Station Square.

As the normal human citizens of the city were going about their daily lives,actually thinking their lucky stars for once Dr. Eggman wasn't sending any of his blasted badniks to cause havoc but soon they had something entirely new to worry about as a large series of tremors made the streets and everything on them rock up and down and while everyone was panicking a huge shadow appeared over the city blocking out the sun everyone present squirted their eyes trying to make out the creature whatever it was's face but it was impossible until "HI EVERYONE!" All the citizens' mouths were dropped to the ground in shock as they stared up and up and up......
"Holy.....is...is that Tails being held by a giant......Cosmo?" Whispered one guy
"How did she get so big?" Cried another Tails grumbled to himself("That's just what I was wondering!")
"Now,now little ones no need to be alarmed I won't hurt of you I just want to have some fun in Station Square for a bit....example....." And too the people's horror and amusement she bent over a foot and pretended to crush a parked empty car people screamed as her other foot came over on top of them but she was merely playing around with them
"HA-HA FOOLED YOU! I'M ONLY PLAYING!" Cosmo cooed cutely "YOU SHOULD SEE THE LOOKS ON YOUR FACES! NOW WHATEVER SHALL I DO NEXT?"
"Umm maybe stop before someone gets hurt?" Tails suggested but Cosmo for once ignored him and proceeded to.....
11111311112.title: Cosmo wants to play a pretend rampage game

111113111121.content:
She started to pick up some panicking and screaming civilians just so she can take a very good look at them and see how they interact. Tails was totally now in lost of words just as he has to watch his girlfriend start randomly picking up all sorts of people, and he wonders if someone might get hurt or even worse than that, possibly get eaten ot fall to their deaths, or get crushed. Whatever what might happen, Tails have to do something, just as she watches Cosmo place them on top of buildings.

"Uh.... Cosmo... this is a pretty bad idea, I am very sure the people are scared of your gigantic height and if you aren't careful, you might attract some unwanted attention." Tails said, flying up close to her, but she still doesn't listens and continues doing what she does, and she even picks up Tails as well. "Or I might have spoken way too soon on that matter." He said just as she tries to fly away from Cosmo, who then proceed to give chase. "Come on, let's have some fun Tails, don't you want to have fun with me?" Cosmo said just as she stomps through the city, crushing bridges and stuff under her feet, with luckily all people out before it happens.

What proceeds to happen then?
111113111121.title: Start picking up citizens for fun

choices: Dr. Eggman comes to "save" the city
111113111122.content:
"I think I might have some fun with this city really now!" Cosmo said in her head just as she starts turning evil for a second. (Well, having her go on a real rampage is pretty much out of character for Cosmo anyway, but what the hell.) The people start running for their lives screaming just as Cosmo starts stomping down cars and even some trainways and smaller buildings. "RWAR... RWAR... The mighty Cosmo is here to destroy this city." Cosmo said for fun just as Tails flied right to the side. "Uh... Cosmo, you are losing control of yourself, you are destroying the city!!!" He said before he sees her wrecking a building with her hands. Luckily everyone was evacuated and such before any sort of harm could come to the people.

"Oh boy, what a day so far... I better find a way to stop her before she gets harmed." He said, and upon seeing all sorts of military vehicles heading her way, that might happen well before long. "Oh no, now I got bigger problems to worry about." He said in his head.

Tails sets off to fly and stop the rampaging Cosmo before she harms anyone.

What happens now?
111113111122.title: Go on a real fun rampage

choices: Before anything happens, the military shows up aiming at one of the two
111113111123.content:
Suddenly, as if the city's problems weren't bad enough for everyone, the ground started rumbling once more, and we all see everyone's favorite villian known as Doctor Eggman, riding along with a giant robot, but it resembles Amy in a lot of ways, and it even did a playful Mechagodzilla like roar. "Hello Cosmo, how nice to come by, I was looking for Sonic elsewhere, and you even have Tails who decided to come along as well. Well it is nice for me to drop by." Eggman said just as he did some movements which somehow mimics the movements he did, with everyone in the city just watching in confusion.

"Okay Eggman, tell me what you are going to do this time?" Tails demanded as he is sure to be up to a new evil scheme this time. "You better not be planning to harm Cosmo and this city."

"Well I will be showing that giant beast you brought here who's boss as I was able to come up with a new plan when I heard that you grew massive and went into the city for a "rampage", I am going to save this city from that giant monster, and show everyone that I changed for the better."

Many people including Tails and Cosmo were confused about the whole situation. "Well for starters, I am not causing any trouble. It was just pretend."

"Well that pretend could end up real if you weren't careful and what I saw... you weren't." Eggman admitted, and then he notice a robbery car coming by right behind Cosmo's big foot. "Uh... Cosmo... behind you." Eggman said with a smile.

Cosmo then turned around and saw that a car was about to hit her foot, and then the drivers and criminals obviously got out of the vehicle before Cosmo crushes it with her foot, which gets her on fire... and then she ends up crashing into a building, causing everyone to panic and get out of the way. "You see... that is why I am here to save this city and de-credit Sonic for it. Who knows, they might give me the key to the city."

What happens now?
111113111123.title: Dr. Eggman shows up with a giant robot

111113112.content:
Sadly, the side that wants Cosmo and Tails forever (with him in his stomach) sadly wins and she ultimately ends up swallowing Tails right into her stomach. Tails screams as he falls right into the esophagus and right into the stomach acids, where he barely was able to use his tail flaps to fly right up before he touches the surface of the acids. Tails was really shocked and horrified of what Cosmo have just done, as she has now eaten him, well not eaten him, but let's just say that he is now inside Cosmo for sure.

"Uh Cosmo, can you hear me?" Tails screamed out as he tries to contact his girlfriend, but sadly it was to no avail as Cosmo was now walking right into the kitchen, making her a sandwich while she smiles. "Tails is now surely in my stomach for safety, so perhaps I will send some food down his way." She smiled, and then she eats some of the sandwiches, and the bits come falling down right on him. He does fly out the way to avoid them, but he sees the acids burning the food down. Something he needs to avoid.

What does he do?
111113112.title: Cosmo loses control of her actions and swallows...

1111131121.content:
"COSMO..... COSMO....!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" Tails said just as he tries desperately to scream for Cosmo to hear him, but it seems not to be working as he is like a dot to her, and a dot cannot even make a hint of a noise at all. It all seem completely hopeless as nothing he can do will reach out to her at all. He even tries sucking up all the air he can and screams at the loudest of his voice. "COSMO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" He screamed angrily as possible at her, trying to get something to hear to her, but nothing. However, it was during that time that he failed to pay attention to the food that was coming down towards him, and sadly he was hit hard by one of them. The weight of the sandwich piece was enough to send him falling right to the acids below. Upon making contact with the acids, Tails begin to scream in panic and agony at the pain of being burned by the acids was just horrible to begin with. His body dissolved until no more of him was seen at all. It was surely game over for him.

"Hmmm... that was so good. I hope Tails like what I sent him down my stomach. Now, perhaps I could go visit the other friends." Cosmo smiled and she begins walking into the forest.

(In honesty, you can edit this add as I was kinda out of ideas on how the screaming could work, so I just killed off Tails, I just hope there isn't a rule against that, so I am allowing a continuing route for Cosmo in this story.)

123.content:
Tails was working on his latest invention when Eggman attacked. "Hohohohoho!!! Well, if it isn't that two-tailed fox, Tails!"
Tails got angry and exclaimed, "What do you want, Eggman?" Eggman laughed and said, "I'm testing my shrink ray on you! That way, you'll be ant sized and getting help from your friends will be extremely difficult! Plus, you won't be able to stop me! Just try it! You'll need all the help you can to get your girlfriend Cosmo's attention before she accidentally steps on you! Hohohohoho!" Eggman shoots Tails with his ray gun and Tails shrinks to the size of an ant. Eggman laughs and goes back to his base.

Tails gets scared and replies, "Oh, great! Now what will I do?" Suddenly, Tails' girlfriend, the green Seedrian plant girl named Cosmo walks into his lab. "HEY, TAILS? WHERE ARE YOU?" Each step Cosmo took felt like an earthquake to Tails. He saw how huge she really was compared to his shrunken state. He was the size of an ant to her. Her shoes looked like they could crush mountains easily. Her hands looked like they could grasp buildings within them. She looked so powerful, very different from the harmless plant girl she usually is when he is at his normal size. "Hey, Cosmo! I'm down here!" Cosmo looks down at her feet and sees a yellow-orange speck.
123.title: Ant sized Tails

choices: Tails rides on her colossal hand
Tails rides on her gigantic, green shoe
1231.content:
Cosmo looked hard and recognized the speck before her eyes. "TAILS?! IS THAT YOU?" Cosmo gently picked up the tiny fox and let him sit in the palm of her gigantic hand. Tails got a little scared and intimidated by her enormous size at first, but she calmed him down. "TAILS, IT'S OKAY. I'M NOT GOING TO HURT YOU." Cosmo patted his head with her finger, which was the size of a house compared to him. Tails felt reassured and spoke to her. "Sorry, Cosmo. It's just that from my current size, you're like a mountain!" Cosmo replied, "I BET I LOOK REALLY GIANT TO YOU. SO, HOW DID YOU SHRINK?" Tails told her, "Eggman did this to me!"
Cosmo gasped and exclaimed, "HOW DARE HE SHRINK YOU! NOW I SEE HOW MUCH OF A DANGEROUS THREAT THIS GUY IS!" Tails replied, "Yeah, I guess he thought that at this size, getting help would be tough. He even said that you might accidentally step on me!" Cosmo said, "WELL, I'M GLAD I DIDN'T! I WOULDN'T WANT MY CUTE LITTLE BOYFRIEND UNDERNEATH MY SHOE." Tails pondered his thoughts for a moment and then he spoke up. "I'm going to need you to protect me from danger while I'm like this." "OF COURSE I WILL! I'LL TAKE CARE OF YOU THE BEST THAT I CAN!" Tails laughed and said, "Great! Just try not to talk too loud, though. Your voice is thunderous to me." Cosmo said, "SORRY, MY BAD. WELL, I'M GOING TO MAKE SOME LUNCH IN THE KITCHEN. DO YOU WANT TO COME WITH ME?" Tails said, "Sure!" Cosmo was happy and said, "GREAT! THE ONLY PROBLEM IS THAT MY DRESS DOESN'T HAVE ANY POCKETS, SO YOU'LL HAVE TO RIDE ME."
1231.title: The Seedrian's tiny boyfriend

choices: Tails flew to the front and asked Cosmo to let him out
Tails gets swallowed into her stomach
12311.content:
Tails blushes and asked his girlfriend, "Since I've been shrunk to dot size and you need to transport me, could I ride in your mouth for a few minutes?" Cosmo immediately shook her head and said, "NO WAY, TAILS! WHAT IF MY TEETH CHEW YOU OR I ACCIDENTALLY SWALLOW YOU?" Tails said, "Calm down, you don't know that's going to happen. I won't be in there that long, I promise. Even if I do land in your stomach, I'll be okay. I can fly, remember?" Cosmo sighed and replied, "OKAY, TAILS, AS YOU WISH. DON'T SAY I DIDN'T WARN YOU, THOUGH" Cosmo gently picked up Tails and opened her mouth, revealing a slimy cave filled with building-sized teeth and a massive tongue. Cosmo stopped for a second and told him, "I STILL DON'T THINK THIS IS A GOOD IDEA, BUT IF IT'S WHAT YOU REALLY WANT, THEN I'LL DO IT."

Cosmo dropped Tails into her mouth and she closed it as she was walking to another room. Tails turned on his flashlight built into his wrist communicator. "Yeah, that's much better. Now I can see in here." Tails looked around and took in his surroundings. "This is pretty neat." Suddenly, Cosmo's tongue was pushing him towards the back of her throat. What happened?
12311.title: Tails rides inside her mouth

choices: Yes, and she lets him out
Nope, and too late... Tails is swallowed
123111.content:
Tails then suddenly flew right to the front of her mouth after that tongue accident that Cosmo just nearly did. "For some reason, you ended up tasty for a second, as you have a good taste when my tongue licked you." Cosmo admitted just as she accidentally licks Tails again, and covers him in solvia in the process. It was pretty yucky indeed, but at that point Tails was wanting out as he didn't wanted to be eaten by his gigantic girlfriend on accident. "Uh... Cosmo, can you let me out of here, because I don't want to end up swallowed by accident."

"Yes Tails, hang on..." she said before her stomach begun to growl right then and there. And that wasn't a good sign for eitehr Tails or Cosmo, well for Cosmo she is hungry, and could end up eating her boyfriend in the process, but at the same time for Tails, he doesn't want to die a horrible death. Tails then starts opening Cosmo's lips just as her tongue licks him again and rubs him in to the side.

Will Cosmo be able to resist the urge to eat Tails?
123111.title: Tails flew to the front and asked Cosmo to let ...

1231111.content:
Luckily, that urge was totally resisted, and she ends up letting Tails right out, although completely covered in salvia as her tongue really seem to lick a lot right out on him. It was totally a weird feeling for Tails alright, but at least he wasn't eaten, but boy will he need a bath tonight for sure. "I think for sure, I am going to need to take a bath as this has got to be one of the most weird feelings that I ever had." He admitted once being inside his giant girlfriend's mouth for any period of time.

"Well I am very sorry that I had to make you kinda go through that, and I will promise that it will be the only time you will ever have to do such a thing. So, I was thinking that perhaps you and I can do something right now. Maybe we can go to the beach and have a bit of a date, perhaps even a pinic there while we are at it, although finding something to eat would be a bit of an issue since I am pretty big to you."

"Well I was working on a size ray that can sort out the food issue. Hold on, let me go get it..." Tails said just as he goes back to his lab to see that his size ray was there, and luckily ready to go. He then grabs it and then goes back to her.

"I think we are ready." He said.

"Alright, let's go."
1231111.title: Yes, and she lets him out

1231112.content:
Well sadly for our friendly Tails who loves Cosmo so much, he is soon about to get more than he bargain for as Cosmo then proceeds after totally losing control of herself to swallow her friendly friend Tails down through the esophagus and right into her stomach, with Tails of course screaming for his life just as he falls down into the stomach, with his tails being activating right in the nix of time so he can avoid contact with the acids. However, Tails was kinda interested other than scared as he always wanted to go inside of a body and explore for a bit. He was still shocked that Cosmo swallowed him, but at least now he can be safe and do something different.

"You know, I was a little surprised, but perhaps I could do some exploring and HOPEFULLY FIND MY WAY OUT OF HERE AS WELL!!!!!" Tails said and also yelling as well at the last part as he kinda panicked as well. Kinda of a two way situation for our furry friend as now he has to get out, but also explore the body and see how Cosmo interacts.

What does he want to do? Decisions... decisions....
1231112.title: Nope, and too late... Tails is swallowed

123112.content:
Sadly though, Tails did failed from her tongue and right into her stomach. It turns out that upon Cosmo taking a nice taste of Tails, she decided that he tasted really really good, and I mean really good. It is not known if Cosmo ever ate any meat at all, so this was her very first time that she did so. Tails took a really good slide right through her esophagus and soon she ends up right into her stomach where some food items were seen and the acids are really into the ground.

(I don't know how Cosmo's looks on the inside and her systems since she is an alien and not a human so I am going based on human insides)

Cosmo was too busy imaging that what she tasted was so good that she felt a little tump inside her stomach as if something was up. "What was that?" She wondered.

Inside her stomach, was Tails hitting the stomach wall some many times as he is trying to get her attention that she ended up eating him by accident. However, does Cosmo get the message?
123112.title: Tails gets swallowed into her stomach

choices: Perhaps try to figure out how to reverse Tails's condition
Perhaps visit some people who could help
12312.content:
"Well I understand that, and of course I got my tail I can fly with if I have to. But I wouldn't want to do your mouth since I might slip and fall into your stomach, but your shoe, again, if I slip and fall off, chances are you might crush me, so I will just take the hand.' Tail then told Cosmo as he explained the scenarios that could really end up playing out. He doesn't want to be eaten or stomped by accident, so riding her hand was the best option for Tails.

So Cosmo holds out her hand and Tails gets on it. Tails then rides Cosmo's hand just as she moves right into the kitchen and starts making some sandwiches after Tails flies right off. "I am sure I will not be eating the whole sandwich since I am this small so a part will do." "Okay Tails." Cosmo tells him, and then she picks up a knife and then cuts a tiny bit of the sandwich for Tails to eat. "There you go." She replied back. They then both eat their respective sandwich.

"So, what do we do Cosmo?"

What does Cosmo want to do?
12312.title: Tails rides on her colossal hand

choices: Build a growth ray to reverse the effects
Before he says..., someone else shows up
123121.content:
"Perhaps if there is a chance, maybe see if we can try to reverse the condition that you have been sadly hit by." Cosmo suggested as now she is beginning to look at the tiny Tails and tries to see what could be done about it. However, just as she was about to speak a lot more to Tails, another person that was wearing a pink dress just comes into the room. It was Amy Rose herself, and she was panicking herself a whole lot. "Amy, what troubles you?"

"Dr. Eggman just shrunk Sonic using a shrink ray and he has him captured." Amy panicked just as she starts to cry in tears that Dr. Eggman has captured Sonic. "Well he ain't the only person who was shrunk." Tails said just as he used his tail and fly to her face. "Notice what happened to me?"

"So you aren't the only one who shrunk? You were as well, by Eggman." Amy then replied back just as she picks him up. "Well I am glad he didn't catch you."

"Well first of all I need to find a way to reverse my condition, and perhaps I could with some help..." Taiks said just as he explains his plan.

What is it?
123121.title: Perhaps try to figure out how to reverse Tails&...

choices: disappears (Shrunk so small that specks of dust is the size of moons to him)
1231211.content:
"If i can make a growth ray, then it should be easier to help Sonic while getting us back to normal. Tails says.

"How long do you think that will take, Tails?" Cosmo ask in concern that it will take forever.

"Well, i was working on a lazer drill earlier, but if i can modify it, then it should be a growth ray...hopefully..." Tails says as he also knows that there is a large chance that his idea could backfire and either make the situation worse, or get himself kill.

"Well, then hurry up and start working on it, we need to save Sonic." Amy says impatiently.

With the girls' help, Tails began working on the lazer. After couple of hours, Tails finishes.

"Are you sure this is safe?" Cosmo ask as she notice that the lazer drill, while looking completely different, seems to be sparking a little.

"No, but what other choice we have in this moment?" Tails says as he flies into a position to where the lazer is aiming at him. "Fire when ready." Tails shouts as he closes his eyes.

Amy walks up to the lazer and aims the device at Tails. "Alright Tails, firing at full strength." She says as she pushes a button and like that, a strong lazer beam hits Tails. After a couple of seconds, the girls see that Tails...
1231211.title: Build a growth ray to reverse the effects

choices: Green fibers ( bottom of Cosmo's skirt)
Red fibers ( Bottom of Amy's skirt)
12312112.content:
"......"


"....."

"...Did Tails....disappeared?" Amy ask nervously as Cosmo simply nods her head. The two quickly ran to where Tails was last seen and sees nothing.


Meanwhile for Tails,

"Ugh, i think you over did it....Amy?" Tails looks around and sees nothing for countless miles. Tails would see massive mountains, but they are too blurry to even give details to him. He would also see strange moon size mountains that appeared to be made of dust.

"I don't like where this..." Tails immediately coveres his ears when suddenly he heard a booming voice that was so loud that it was impossible to understood it. Then Tails felt a series of earthquakes that were so strong, he is possitive that the universe would shatter. Suddenly, a powerful force launches Tails up into the air and land somewhere nearby. That force alone was just the girls walking towards him, yet their simple steps arw enough to make Tails fly all over. Before Tails knew it, he lands on another unfamiliar landscape. However, he could tell something about the new land, its definitely made of fibers. The fibers are long enough to hold galaxies themselves. Tails is not liking the idea of what happened to him as he stares at the endless plain of.....
12312112.title: disappears (Shrunk so small that specks of dust...

choices: Tails fall through the skirt and is inside the front of Cosmo's panties
123121121.content:
"Como, Amy!?" Tails shouts as he looks around the endless green fober world. The fox is confuse as to where he was, but before he could do something, the world shakes. "What's going on?!"

Back at normal size world. Amy and Cosmo ran to were Tails shrunk. They search with magnifying glass but found nothing.
"Well, Cosmo, i don't know how to say this, but I think I shrunk Tails at a microscopic state." Amy says, only then hearing a thud. She turns her head and see Cosmo on her back and uncouncious. The shock of Tails shrinking again must have made her faint.

"Poor Tails... but if i was a betting girl, I'm sure he safe enough that i can cave Sonic." Amy says as she takes the one thing that could possibly find Tails and leaves.

Back to Tails. The shaking finally stopped. Unfortunately, that doesn't mean thing are better for the poor fox. With no where to go, Tails figures he might as well walk until he finds something. After what felt like hours of walking...
123121121.title: Green fibers ( bottom of Cosmo's skirt)

1231211211.content: And he fell on with path
1231211211.title: Tails fall through the skirt and is inside the ...

choices: No, she still tries to swap him down
Yes, but Tails have to convince her
1232.content:
Cosmo looks at the image very closely that she tries to see and sees some yellow object moving around, and then she truly ends up gasping. "AAAHHH.... a bug..." Cosmo said, and then she raises her foot down and tries to stomp it, causing Tails to move out the way, but it surely felt like an earthquake to him. Then Tails had to start running around to avoid being crushed by a gigantic Cosmo. "You get back here bug so I can crush you...." Cosmo said to the bug (who was Tails sadly) and then Tails tried to fly with his tail so he can get right up to Cosmo and explain to him what happened.

Cosmo then tried to swat Tails down, still thinking that he is a bug, and then he yells out. "Cosmo, it is me, Tails!!!!!!" He screamed out, and even went close to her eye.

Does Cosmo see and hear Tails?
1232.title: Cosmo thinks he's a bug

choices: Head to the lab and make a size ray
Have some lunch as he is hungry
12321.content:
Upon hearing a tiny bit of Tails, she then took a very close look and then she gasped of what she saw. It was in fact Tails himself, and she really stop what she was doing. She was totally shocked of what has happened to the dot Tails and she hopes to figure out what is going on before something worse can possibly happen to him. "Tails, I cannot believe that it is you. How did you got so tiny?" Cosmo wondered. "Well it is not a question of what happen, it is a question of who, and I know who did it specifically." He said to her. "It was Eggman, it had to be him."

"Yep, he shrunk me using his size ray and I am starting to think that Sonic could now be in some serious trouble, but first I need to get myself back to my proper size. And I will need your help keeping me safe as I try to figure this out. Think you can do that?" He asked as he hoped his giant-sized girlfriend who sees him as a dot could be of some sort of help.

"Of course Tails, anything you need, I am here for you. So, where should we start?" Cosmo asked.

"Well we could..." Tails said.
12321.title: Yes, and she stops

info.brief_description: A size interactive with Tails and Cosmo. Other Sonic characters allowed to be part of it.
info.description:
No gay stuff or giant guys. No short chapters. Can do feet and vore. Other things like insertion is allowed. Keep Tails and Cosmo, as well as everyone else, in character. No out of character moments. If you read this story, please add some chapters. I'm having trouble coming up with new ideas and I could use all the help I can get. No characters can die, with a single route exception.


PLEASE ADD!!!! Thank you!
